about_the_game:
"Welcome to the Ladies' Academy!"

Yukiko has just been accepted into the prestigious Aoi Academy for Young Ladies, a place where she can make new friends and perhaps find love. Every day at the academy is a new opportunity for her to discover herself, share unforgettable moments, and enjoy the life she has always wished for.

But as she approaches the end of her story Yukiko begins to question the reality of everything around her. Is this truly the life she dreamed of, or is there something deeper?

Key Features

  • A short but meaningful journey: Perfect for players who are looking for a light, easy-to-read story to pass the time.
  • Star Princess: The main route with Hoshiko is complete and ready to be experienced until the end.
  • Steam Achievements: Unlock achievements as you play and read Yuki's story.

Credits

  • Temporary backgrounds: Minikle, Claire (NoranekoGames), and Selavi Games
  • Music: Souichi Sakagami (Trial & Error) and Kevin MacLeod
  • Temporary sprites: Claire (NoranekoGames)
  • Spanish proofreading: Suki
  • English Translation: Suki
  • Spanish & English Proofreading: Suki
  • English Proofreading: MaryZ

highlighted.name: My dear princess of the stars
Wow! we are back to the 90's!

detailed_description:
"Welcome to the Ladies' Academy!"

Yukiko has just been accepted into the prestigious Aoi Academy for Young Ladies, a place where she can make new friends and perhaps find love. Every day at the academy is a new opportunity for her to discover herself, share unforgettable moments, and enjoy the life she has always wished for.

But as she approaches the end of her story Yukiko begins to question the reality of everything around her. Is this truly the life she dreamed of, or is there something deeper?

Key Features

  • A short but meaningful journey: Perfect for players who are looking for a light, easy-to-read story to pass the time.
  • Star Princess: The main route with Hoshiko is complete and ready to be experienced until the end.
  • Steam Achievements: Unlock achievements as you play and read Yuki's story.

Credits

  • Temporary backgrounds: Minikle, Claire (NoranekoGames), and Selavi Games
  • Music: Souichi Sakagami (Trial & Error) and Kevin MacLeod
  • Temporary sprites: Claire (NoranekoGames)
  • Spanish proofreading: Suki
  • English Translation: Suki
  • Spanish & English Proofreading: Suki
  • English Proofreading: MaryZ

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game can run in every linux distro based on debian

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.15
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Bugs were detected with macOS 13, so the execution may fail.

name: Roses Of Love

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 series, AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Additional Notes: 64-bit operating system required

short_description: You will immerse yourself in the story of Yukiko, a young woman who dreams of studying in the big city and making her wishes come true. Will this be the life she always dreamed of, or is there something deeper?
